about-us-section.intro_1: Welcome to Home Stay â€“ founded in 2024, we offer a cozy, minimalist space that feels like home.
about-us-section.intro_2: Our homestay is designed to provide all the comforts of home while immersing you in the beauty of the surrounding landscape. Each space is thoughtfully curated to promote relaxation and rejuvenation.
